actions.name: Light Clay
actions.description:
Trigger: The user creates a non-[Weather], non-[Environ], non-Status-inflicting, or non-Stage-affecting effect that lasts for X Rounds.
Effect: The duration of the triggering effect is increased by +2.

cost.trigger: The user creates a non-[Weather], non-[Environ], non-Status-inflicting, or non-Stage-affecting effect that lasts for X Rounds.
